price: Na wao wakafanya haraka kufuata nyayo zao.
footnotes: Wao waliwakuta baba zao wamepotoka, na wao wakafanya haraka kufuata zile zile nyayo za baba zao. Wakawa mbioni kwendea njia yao, wakifuata tu wala hawachungui, kama walio timuliwa na wakihimizwa wende mbio mbio kuwafuata hao baba zao bila ya kupima wala kuzingatia.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
